text: “Ia orakigh! Kɨ, okɨmakɨar gumazimɨn mɨn izam, a izir dughiam ia a gɨfozir puvatɨzɨ moghɨn, kɨ zuamɨra otogham. Kamagh amizɨ, gumazim akuir puvatɨgha, uan korotiaba uabɨn boroghɨn da arɨsi, a bibiamra daruan kogham, eghtɨ gumazamiziba an gantɨ, an aghumsɨghan kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir kam bar akongegh.”16:15 Ves 15ɨn kam, kar Krais Iesus uabɨ mɨkemezir akam.
